mapper.select: select rf_no, d.d_no, d.p_no, o.m_no, rf_title, rf_reason, rf_image, rf_date, rf_total, d.d_refund from refund rf inner join order_detail d on rf.d_no = d.d_no inner join orders o on d.o_no = o.o_no where rf_no = #{rf_no}
mapper.insert: insert into refund(rf_no, d_no, rf_title, rf_reason, rf_image, rf_total) values(msix_seq.nextval, #{d_no}, #{rf_title}, #{rf_reason}, #{rf_image}, #{rf_total})
